doYouHaveSymptoms.symptomsExist: If you're experiencing any of these symptoms, it's important to consult with a specialist. Early diagnosis and treatment can significantly improve your quality of life

topic.subtitle: What Are Fibroids?
topic.title: Understanding Fibroids
topic.whatIsTopic: Uterine fibroids are non-cancerous growths that develop in or around the uterus. They are very common, affecting up to 80% of women by age 50. While many women experience no symptoms, others may have significant discomfort.
